description: This API is used for fetching the ResourceProperty of the Glue connection (for the source) or Glue database ARN (for the target)

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: The connection ARN of the source, or the database ARN of the target.

nested_items.name: ResourceArn
nested_items.description: The connection ARN of the source, or the database ARN of the target.

nested_items.name: SourceProcessingProperties
nested_items.description: The resource properties associated with the integration source.

nested_items.name: RoleArn
nested_items.description: The IAM role to access the Glue connection.

nested_items.name: TargetProcessingProperties
nested_items.description: The resource properties associated with the integration target.

nested_items.name: RoleArn
nested_items.description: The IAM role to access the Glue database.

nested_items.name: KmsArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the KMS key used for encryption.

nested_items.name: ConnectionName
nested_items.description: The Glue network connection to configure the Glue job running in the customer VPC.

nested_items.name: EventBusArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of an Eventbridge event bus to receive the integration status notification.
